summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: The Elder unto the beloved Gaius whom I love in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, I wish chiefly that thou prosperedst and faredst well as thy soul prospereth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For I rejoiceth greatly when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, how thou walkest in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than these, that is, to hear that my sons walk in verity.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully, whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Which bore witness of thy love before the Churches, Whom if thou bringest on their journey as it seemeth according to God, thou shalt do well,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Because that for his Nameâ€™s sake they went forth, and took nothing of the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be helpers to the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote unto the Church, but Diotrephes which loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Wherefore if I come, I will call to your remembrance his deeds which he doeth, prattling against us with malicious words, and not therewith content, neither he himself receiveth the brethren, but forbideth them that would, and thrusteth them out of the Church.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good: he that doeth well is of God: but he that doeth evil, hath not seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself: yea, and we ourselves bear record, and ye know that our record is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have many things to write: but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak mouth to mouth. Peace be with thee. The friends salute thee. Greet thy friends by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
